title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 266: Featuring Tom Green & Barstool Chief
description:
On Thursday’s episode of Spititn’ Chiclets the guys are joined by Tom Green and Barstool Chief. Chief joins (13:26) to talk all things Blackhawks and what he is hearing regarding the firing of Blackhawks CEO John McDonough. Then Tom joins (47:35) to talk about his hockey fandom, growing up in Ottawa, the Tom Green Show and more. The guys also touch on some NHL news, recap what Juice Boy is, and how RA wanted to be a Playboy Photographer as a kid.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
